subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer, the No.1 player in the world for the last 187 weeks, took advantage of Novak Djokovic’s mistakes to capture a 7-6 (4), 7-6 (2), 6-4 victory.
snippet: Roger Federer, the No.1 player in the world for the last 187 weeks, took advantage of Novak Djokovic’s mistakes to capture a 7-6 (4), 7-6 (2), 6-4 victory.
